text: "Walk This World" was the first single released by Heather Nova. Released in 1994, the song was included on the studio album Oyster. This is the song she is most known for, which has led to her being considered a one hit wonder in many countries. == Music video == The music video was directed by Zach Snyder and was filmed all around the world, while Heather plays her guitar and sings the song at the different locations. == Charts == {| class="wikitable" |+ !Chart !Peak position |- |Australia |28 |- |Germany |91 |- |New Zealand |19 |- |UK |69 |} == References == == External links == * Lyrics of this song at MetroLyrics * Music video at YouTube Category:1994 singles
title: Walk This World
